WorkItem.Description:
i was facing issue of multiple/overlapping of Column in Column series of the charting toolkit(PFA). 
when i snooped it by a UI tool i found that in Pie series DataPoint are getting updated but in column series it only adds up. 
when searched for solution. i found http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3039141/binding-update-adds-news-series-to-wpf-toolkit-chart-instead-of-replacing-updat

but i cannot use the above mentioned one as i am using dll only. is this issue fixed in newer version? or any other workaround available?
WorkItem.Summary: Binding update adds news series to WPF Toolkit chart (instead of replacing/updating series)
